description:
<p>We are looking for <strong>Operating Department Practitioners/Anaesthetic Nurses</strong> to join our friendly and professional within our main theatres department. As a member of the anaesthetic team you will be well supported by a Band 7 Speciality Lead, X2 Band 6 Specialist Practitioners and a team of Band 5 Operating Department Practitioners/Anaesthetic Nurses to deliver exceptional patient care. We are an enthusiastic, passionate and caring team providing expert care in both an elective and acute surgical setting. The service we provide is 24/7 with a wide range of shifts available so we are able to offer flexibility in the way staff work. We have a Band 7 Professional Development Facilitator who will provide educational opportunities to support your career development. We will provide a supportive learning environment, a period of supernumerary time to achieve competencies and offer both professional and leadership development.</p>
<p>For further information please contact Specialty Lead Adele Makepeace on 01423 554 648 or adele.makepeace@nhs.net</p>
